column4: hi everybody, i am n edgy and just followed the steps here to install beryl http://wiki.beryl-project.org/index.php/Install/Ubuntu/Edgy/nVIDIA. the problem is now i have beryl working without window borders
does anybody know what i might have done wrong?
fnord: i have tried $beryl but i have the same problem
if window borders and decorations are not showing up, try changing DefaultDepth to 24 in the Screen section
